properties.name: app.oauth.redirect-uri
properties.description: A landing url for redirection from successful oauth authentication.

properties.name: app.cors.allowed-methods
properties.description: HTTP methods in the application that are allowed by CORS.

properties.name: app.cors.allowed-origins
properties.description: Origins that are allowed by CORS .

properties.name: app.rsa.rsa-private-key
properties.description: Location of the private key for jwt.

properties.name: app.rsa.rsa-public-key
properties.description: Location of the public key for jwt.

properties.name: app.security.refresh-token-expiration-minutes
properties.description: expiration of refresh token in minutes.

properties.name: app.security.access-token-expiration-seconds
properties.description: expiration of access token in seconds.
